name: Loretta's Brand-New Job
description:
Story

When Elio, a politician who's living a happy and peaceful life with his wife, Loretta, takes up the position of editor-in-chief of his party's paper, trouble arises as a new writer, Fabro, joins the group. Fabro didn't come to the party to help Elio... quite the contrary, actually. He has his eyes set on Elio's position, and he's ready and willing to do anything to get it—including making Loretta his pawn. What will become of Loretta's brand-new job as Elio's secretary? And how will Elio thwart Fabro's diabolical schemes?

Gameplay

Discover a beautiful town set in the 1900s as you explore its streets and speak with the locals. Elio must stop Fabro from realizing his diabolical plans, and it's up to you to investigate the town and uncover the truth from your fellow citizens! Experience a traditional slice-of-life RPG while you unearth the truths hidden behind Fabro's deceit. Stop Fabro and don't let him steal your position in the party!

Characters

Elio

A politician living a happy and peaceful life with his elven wife and secretary, Loretta, Elio is now editor-in-chief for his party's paper. He loves his wife more than anything in the world.

Loretta

Born into a wealthy family, Loretta is a high-class lady who prides herself on her proper etiquette. Previously more cold and reserved, ever since meeting Elio, Loretta has started acting warm and kind towards those around her. She's especially genial in front of her husband.

Fabro

Loretta's former professor. Seeking even more power and control than he has now, Fabro threatens Elio and is ready to use any means necessary to take his party down.
